QuestData.Title: Bearzerker
QuestData.Description: High Chieftain Winterfall's absence has done little to quell the rage of the Winterfall. In his absence, their greatest warrior has rose to a position of terrible power.$B$BGrolnar the Berserk lurks in the cave at the top of Winterfall Village, gorged on enough corrupt firewater to kill ten lesser furbolgs.$B$BHe has become a bloated and horrible beast! Our warriors have been unable to face him... do you have the strength to defeat him, $c?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Gorged on corrupted firewater, he towers over all furbolg.
QuestData.RewardText: Your actions prove yourself a mighty warrior to me and all the Timbermaw!$B$BLet us hope the Winterfall will be defeated for good now...
